lyrics:
9 contributorsthe thing about love lyricsverse 1
love love will come find you
just to remind you of who you are
oh love it will forsake you
threaten to break you take what you got

chorus
everybody laughs everybody cries
oh it could hurt you baby but give it a little try
see thats the thing about love

verse 2
friends sometimes will blind you
sneak up behind you you cant give enough
then life it will embrace you ha
totally amaze you so you dont give up

chorus
everybody laughs everybody cries
sure it could hurt you baby but give it a little try
see thats the thing about love

bridge
oh tell me that i am not the only one thats going through it all
oh sometimes i feel like im the only one going through it all
but its time oh its time for me to shine hey
so its bout time oh its time for me to shine
its my time said its my time for me to shine oh oh oh
oh its my time its bout time for me to shine

but give it a little try
